summary: Provides an asynchronous client implementation for the Digifinex cryptocurrency exchange, wrapping all exchange endpoints into a unified interface that supports fetching market data, account balances, order creation, cancellation and status queries, as well as margin, leverage, funding and transaction operations while handling precision, authentication and error mapping.
business_intent: Allows developers and automated trading systems to integrate with Digifinex programmatically, facilitating realâ€‘time data collection, order execution, portfolio management and risk controls for crypto trading strategies.
